Text:
Thanks to uploader for sharing. I just uploaded the 8th ed. for those interested.

Future engineers using this text for their Physics class should note that, contrary to what the authors keep stating since at least their 3rd edition of the textbook, the Tacoma Narrows Bridge incident is NOT a case of resonance. As my civil engineer father keeps saying, Â«It can't be resonance, there's no stand-alone oscillating driving force!Â» Some explanations (comments) given on YouTube, watch vid v=3mclp9QmCGs  (direct links to YouTube not allowed on TPB)
